description:
This is in response to a bug report from Boris, who noticed that recent versions of MCell, when given reactions: a+b -> c [rate1]
a+b -> d [rate2]
a+b -> e [rate3]
would give three probability reports with different probabilities, as appropriate, but the reports would all reference the same set of products.
author: Jed Wing <jed@salk.edu>
